title: [1.4.5][SSP/LAN/SMP][FORGE]fleshToLeather
author: ZLainSama
txt_content:
介绍：把腐肉烧成皮革

地址：http://puu.sh/1AsDr

PS：应某个家伙做的
PS2：话说我没加强制要求客户端安装的，所以可能会悲剧，快断网了，反正就是个小东西，先发上来

replies.author: hyperx
replies.txt_content: well um is it just a recipe ... ? looks like an overkill to release it as a stand alone mod
